scripts.build:dev: node scripts/set-env.js development && ng build --configuration development
scripts.build:staging: node scripts/set-env.js staging && ng build --configuration staging
scripts.build:prod: node scripts/set-env.js production && ng build --configuration production
scripts.serve:dev: node scripts/set-env.js development && ng serve --configuration development
scripts.serve:staging: node scripts/set-env.js staging && ng serve --configuration staging
